TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter Implements IDisposable
public ref class WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter abstract : IDisposable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 對所有工作流程訊息篩選條件提供基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for all workflow message filters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流程設計工具會提供 `Strategy` 設計模式，以建立可取代的訊息篩選物件來處理事件。The workflow designer provides a `Strategy` design pattern to create replaceable message filter objects to handle events. 衍生自 類別，可建立會回應至工作流程設計工具事件 (例如拖曳作業、配置和繪製作業以及其他設計工具事件) 的訊息篩選條件。Derive from the class to create message filters that can respond to workflow designer events, such as drag operations, layout and paint operations, and other designer events. 若要將自訂訊息篩選條件新增至訊息篩選條件鏈結，請呼叫 上的 ，或覆寫自訂根活動上的 虛擬屬性，並將自訂訊息篩選條件新增至從基底類別傳回的集合。To add a custom message filter to the message filters chain, call the on the or override the virtual property on the custom root activity and add the custom message filter to the collection returned from the base class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範衍生自 的自訂設計工具訊息篩選條件。The following code example shows a custom designer message filter that derives from . 名稱為 `CustomMessageFilter` 的類別會覆寫一些基底類別方法，包括 、、、、、、、、 和 。The class, named `CustomMessageFilter`, overrides a number of its base class methods including , , , , , , , , , and . 這個程式碼範例是 DesignerShell.cs 檔案中＜Basic Designer Hosting SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Basic Designer Hosting SDK Sample from the DesignerShell.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 基本設計工具裝載](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741708(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Basic Designer Hosting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741708(v=vs.90)). [!code-csharp[wf_Samples#237](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#237)] [!code-vb[wf_Samples#237](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#237)]

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 會透過將處置設定為 `Dispose` 而叫用 `false`。 invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > `Dispose` 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。`Dispose` can be called multiple times by other objects. 覆寫 `Dispose(Boolean)` 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 `Dispose` 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。When overriding `Dispose(Boolean)`, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to `Dispose`. 如需有關如何實作`Dispose(Boolean)`，請參閱 < [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information about how to implement `Dispose(Boolean)`, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱`Dispose`和`Finalize`，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see `Dispose` and `Finalize`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使訊息篩選條件和 產生關聯，以擷取從使用者互動中產生的訊息，例如滑鼠事件、鍵盤事件、繪圖和配置事件。You can associate message filters with the to capture messages that occur from user interaction, such as mouse events, keyboard events, paint and layout events.

span.span: if the message is handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 發生於按兩下滑鼠時。 occurs when you double-click the mouse. 按兩下是由作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。The double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the operating system. 您可以設定滑鼠按鍵按一下間隔多少時間才視為按兩下，而不是兩次的按一下。You can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that is considered a double-click rather than two clicks. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫 方法以傳回 `false`，讓設計工具結構中的其他元件也可以處理方法。The following code example shows how to override the method to return `false` so that other components in the designer architecture can process the method. 這個程式碼範例是 DesignerShell.cs 檔案中＜Basic Designer Hosting SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Basic Designer Hosting SDK Sample from the DesignerShell.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 基本設計工具裝載](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741708(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Basic Designer Hosting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741708(v=vs.90)). remarks.format: ## Remarks `OnQueryContinueDrag` 發生於拖曳作業時。`OnQueryContinueDrag` occurs during a drag operation. `OnQueryContinueDrag` 事件允許拖曳來源決定是否應取消拖曳作業。The `OnQueryContinueDrag` event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag operation should be canceled. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫 方法，讓它永遠都會傳回 `true`。The following code example shows how to override the method so that it always returns `true`. 這個程式碼範例是 DesignerShell.cs 檔案中＜Basic Designer Hosting SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Basic Designer Hosting SDK Sample from the DesignerShell.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 基本設計工具裝載](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741708(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Basic Designer Hosting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741708(v=vs.90)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以從作業系統中接收未經處理的 Win32 訊息。The can receive raw Win32 messages from the operating system. 要處理之轉寄至 的訊息。Messages forward to the to be handled.
